description:
Miss Monochrome and her coworker Akiko have a jam session behind the convenience store. Both Maneo and Yayoi are content and praise how great it sounds. When Miss Monochrome and the others return to the office, they discuss creating goods to sell at her live concerts. It`s an exciting promo-items meeting where ideas like Reversi, Rubik`s Cubes, glow sticks, towels, T-shirts, and come up like rapid-fire. But when Akiko proposes guitar picks, Miss Monochrome immediately says they`re unnecessary...
Source: crunchyroll
